summary: MY SUPPLEMENTAL AIR BAG LIGHT CAME ON 7 - 10 DAYS AGO AND HAS REMAINED ON.  VISITED NISSAN SERVICE  ON 05/17 AND WAS TOLD DIAGNOSTIC TESTS REVEALED 3 CODES INDICATED FURTHER WORK WAS NEEDED. THE FIRST WAS TO REPLACE THE DIAGNOSTIC UNIT.  SECOND REPLACE OCS  MODULES 7 BOTH SENSORS.  I HAVE AN EXTENDED WARRANTY WHICH SUPPOSEDLY DOES NOT INCLUDE AIR BAGS.  MY CONCERN IS TIS ACTUALLY IS OR SHOULD BE A RECALL.  MY QUOTED PRICE TO FIX AIRBAGS/CODES  IS GREATER THAN $1500.
